p: On the other hand, since in patients with diabetes any infectious disease worsens the degree of metabolic control with a negative effect on the recovery, also COVID-19 infection may generate a vicious circle that would be detrimental for a better prognosis. It is also important to consider that COVID-19 receptors ACE2 are expressed on several organs and tissues, with a consequent risk of multiorgan failure other than lung involvement [45].
